## Source: ossf-package-analysis (62971b65e18446144c3987b2e748be1659667c56f764920e44ca8b98b516a62b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'electron-release-clerk' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
